encyclopedia.content: explorer.exe是Windows程序管理器或者Windows资源管理器，它用于管理Windows图形壳，包括开始菜单、任务栏、桌面和文件管理。删除该程序会导致Windows图形界面无法适用。

entry.def: An explorer is someone who travels to places about which very little is known, in order to discover what is there.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who travels into little known regions (especially for some scientific purpose)
